title: I'm actually glad people are being auto filled support
body: Maybe people will actually learn to play it now

replies.body:
Shh! You're gonna make me lose my secret to gaining elo.
Kappa

-Support Main-
i am a firm advocate that all adcs should learn support and vice versa, it makes playing those roles so much easier when you know what your lane partner is capable of
I'm having so much fun playing Janna!

I remember earlier season when you actually had to be decent at every frigging role.
Get though or die!
I had to be decent at top and support cause I would request support if I did not get top.
when supp carries adc tho rofl

Happens pretty often tbh
Unless the ADC is literally potato
